config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration 'USER_STYLESHEET_URI' is used to retrieve the user stylesheet specified in the TranscodingHints. It first checks if the stylesheet URI is present in the hints, and if so, returns it. If not found, it falls back to the superclass method to get the stylesheet URI.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration 'USER_STYLESHEET_URI' is triggered whenever the getUserStyleSheetURI() method is called in the code. The frequency of triggering depends on how often this method is invoked in the system.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the 'USER_STYLESHEET_URI' configuration option is related to the customization of stylesheets for transcoding. If a user specifies a stylesheet URI, it will be used in the transcoding process, affecting the appearance and layout of the output. If not specified, the default behavior defined in the superclass method will be used.
